nodes.id: 西藏自治区外事侨务办公室

zh-cn: 西藏自治区外事侨务办公室
中央人民政府驻西藏代表外事帮办办公室
西藏自治区人民委员会外事处
西藏自治区外事办公室

description.zh-cn: 西藏自治区人民政府的组成部门，统筹协调和归口管理西藏自治区外事侨务工作。
description.en: A component department of the People's Government of the Tibet Autonomous Region, responsible for coordinating and managing foreign and overseas Chinese affairs in the region.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任西藏自治区外事侨务办公室主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Director of the Foreign and Overseas Chinese Affairs Office of the Tibet Autonomous Region.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国西藏自治区的省级国家行政机关。
description.en: The provincial-level state administrative organ of the Tibet Autonomous Region of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府 (1949年－1954年)

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府 (1949年－1954年)
中华人民共和国中央人民政府

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期的中央政府。
description.en: The central government of the People's Republic of China in its early years.

description.zh-cn: 1959年之前西藏地方的行政机构。
description.en: The administrative body of the local government of Tibet before 1959.

description.zh-cn: 中国外交官，曾任西藏外事帮办、西藏外事处处长。
description.en: Chinese diplomat, former Foreign Affairs Assistant Commissioner in Tibet and Director of the Tibet Foreign Affairs Office.

description.zh-cn: 西藏噶厦政府官员，后任中央人民政府驻西藏代表外事帮办办公室副帮办。
description.en: An official of the Kashag government of Tibet, later served as Deputy Assistant Commissioner of the Office of the Foreign Affairs Assistant Commissioner of the CPG Representative in Tibet.

description.zh-cn: 藏传佛教格鲁派的领袖。
description.en: The spiritual leader of the Gelug school of Tibetan Buddhism.

description.zh-cn: 第十四世达赖喇嘛的姐夫，曾在中央人民政府驻西藏代表外事帮办办公室工作。
description.en: Brother-in-law of the 14th Dalai Lama, who worked at the Office of the Foreign Affairs Assistant Commissioner of the CPG Representative in Tibet.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国外交部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国负责外交事务的政府部门。
description.en: The government department of the People's Republic of China responsible for foreign affairs.

description.zh-cn: 1942年由西藏噶厦政府设立的外事机构，于1953年被撤销。
description.en: A foreign affairs body established by the Tibetan Kashag government in 1942 and dissolved in 1953.

nodes.id: 西藏自治区筹备委员会

zh-cn: 西藏自治区筹备委员会

description.zh-cn: 为正式建立西藏自治区而设立的筹备机构。
description.en: A preparatory committee established for the formal creation of the Tibet Autonomous Region.

description.zh-cn: 1959年在西藏地区发生的武装冲突事件。
description.en: An armed conflict that occurred in the Tibet region in 1959.

description.zh-cn: 藏传佛教格鲁派的宗教领袖。
description.en: A spiritual leader of the Gelug school of Tibetan Buddhism.

nodes.id: 西藏自治区人民政府办公厅

zh-cn: 西藏自治区人民政府办公厅

description.zh-cn: 西藏自治区人民政府的综合办事机构。
description.en: The general administrative office of the People's Government of the Tibet Autonomous Region.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任西藏自治区外事办公室主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Director of the Foreign Affairs Office of the Tibet Autonomous Region.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任西藏自治区外事侨务办公室主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Director of the Foreign and Overseas Chinese Affairs Office of the Tibet Autonomous Region.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任西藏自治区人民委员会外事处处长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Director of the Foreign Affairs Office of the People's Committee of the Tibet Autonomous Region.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任西藏自治区外事办公室主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Director of the Foreign Affairs Office of the Tibet Autonomous Region.

nodes.id: 中央人民政府和西藏地方政府关于和平解放西藏办法的协议

zh-cn: 中央人民政府和西藏地方政府关于和平解放西藏办法的协议

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府与西藏地方政府签订的关于西藏和平解放的协议。
description.en: The agreement signed by the Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China and the local government of Tibet regarding the peaceful liberation of Tibet.

relationships.source: 西藏自治区外事侨务办公室
relationships.target: 西藏自治区人民政府

description.zh-cn: 西藏自治区外事侨务办公室是西藏自治区人民政府的组成部门。
description.en: The Foreign and Overseas Chinese Affairs Office of the Tibet Autonomous Region is a component department of the People's Government of the Tibet Autonomous Region.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府 (1949年－1954年)
relationships.target: 西藏自治区外事侨务办公室

description.zh-cn: 1952年9月6日，中华人民共和国中央人民政府在拉萨成立了西藏自治区外事侨务办公室的前身“中央人民政府驻西藏代表外事帮办办公室”。
description.en: On September 6, 1952, the Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China established the predecessor of the office, the 'Office of the Foreign Affairs Assistant Commissioner of the CPG Representative in Tibet', in Lhasa.

relationships.source: 西藏自治区外事侨务办公室
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国外交部

description.zh-cn: 中央人民政府驻西藏代表外事帮办办公室在中央人民政府外交部的领导下办理西藏的一切涉外事宜。
description.en: The Office of the Foreign Affairs Assistant Commissioner of the CPG Representative in Tibet handled all foreign affairs of Tibet under the leadership of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Central People's Government.

relationships.target: 西藏自治区外事侨务办公室
西藏自治区外事侨务办公室

description.zh-cn: 杨公素于1952年9月任中央人民政府驻西藏代表外事帮办办公室帮办，1956年4月任西藏外事处处长，直至1963年初调离。
description.en: Yang Gongsu served as the Assistant Commissioner of the Office of the Foreign Affairs Assistant Commissioner of the CPG Representative in Tibet from September 1952, and became Director of the Tibet Foreign Affairs Office in April 1956, until his transfer in early 1963.

relationships.target: 西藏自治区外事侨务办公室
西藏自治区外事侨务办公室

description.zh-cn: 第十四世达赖喇嘛将他的姐夫达拉·平措扎西派到外事帮办办公室工作。
description.en: The 14th Dalai Lama sent his brother-in-law, Tala Phuntsok Tashi, to work at the Office of the Foreign Affairs Assistant Commissioner.

relationships.target: 西藏自治区外事侨务办公室

description.zh-cn: 第十四世达赖喇嘛将他的姐夫达拉·平措扎西派到外事帮办办公室工作，以表明他对外事工作的重视。
description.en: The 14th Dalai Lama sent his brother-in-law, Tala Phuntsok Tashi, to work at the Office of the Foreign Affairs Assistant Commissioner to show the importance he attached to foreign affairs.

relationships.source: 中央人民政府和西藏地方政府关于和平解放西藏办法的协议
relationships.target: 噶厦

description.zh-cn: 《十七条协议》第十四条规定由中央人民政府统一处理西藏地区的一切涉外事宜，结束了噶厦直接与外国交往的状况。
description.en: Article 14 of the Seventeen Point Agreement stipulated that the Central People's Government would handle all external affairs of the Tibet region, ending the situation where the Kashag directly engaged with foreign countries.

relationships.source: 西藏自治区外事侨务办公室
relationships.target: 噶厦外交部

description.zh-cn: 随着中央人民政府驻西藏代表外事帮办办公室的成立和运作，原噶厦外交局最终于1953年被正式撤销并并入该办公室。
description.en: Following the establishment and operation of the Office of the Foreign Affairs Assistant Commissioner of the CPG Representative in Tibet, the former Kashag Foreign Bureau was formally dissolved in 1953 and merged into it.

relationships.source: 西藏自治区外事侨务办公室
relationships.target: 西藏自治区筹备委员会

description.zh-cn: 1956年4月西藏自治区筹备委员会成立后，外事帮办办公室改为西藏外事处，编制上成为其下属单位。
description.en: After the Preparatory Committee for the Tibet Autonomous Region was established in April 1956, the Office of the Foreign Affairs Assistant Commissioner was renamed the Tibet Foreign Affairs Office and became its subordinate unit.

relationships.target: 第十四世达赖喇嘛

description.zh-cn: 西藏自治区筹备委员会成立后，达赖喇嘛任主任，杨公素成为达赖的下属。
description.en: After the establishment of the Preparatory Committee for the Tibet Autonomous Region, the Dalai Lama served as its director, and Yang Gongsu became his subordinate.

relationships.target: 噶厦

description.zh-cn: 1959年藏区骚乱发生后，国务院于1959年3月28日发布命令解散噶厦。
description.en: Following the 1959 Tibetan uprising, the State Council issued an order on March 28, 1959, to dissolve the Kashag.

relationships.target: 西藏自治区筹备委员会
西藏自治区筹备委员会

relationships.source: 西藏自治区外事侨务办公室
relationships.target: 西藏自治区人民政府办公厅

description.zh-cn: 1986年底，西藏自治区外事办公室曾一度降格为隶属于西藏自治区人民政府办公厅的县级机构，此状况持续不到两年。
description.en: At the end of 1986, the Tibet Autonomous Region Foreign Affairs Office was temporarily downgraded to a county-level agency subordinate to the General Office of the People's Government of the Tibet Autonomous Region, a status that lasted for less than two years.

relationships.target: 西藏自治区外事侨务办公室
西藏自治区外事侨务办公室
西藏自治区外事侨务办公室
西藏自治区外事侨务办公室
